CustomField.description: Determines how persistent the toast is. Valid values are: dismissible—(Default) Remains visible until the user clicks the close button or 3 seconds has elapsed, whichever comes first. pester—Remains visible for 3 seconds. sticky—Remains visible until the user clicks the close button.
